Verses: 1 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Naan Paarvonukkuch Seyvadhai Ippozhudhu Kaanbaai; Balaththa Kaiyaik Kandu Avargalaip Pogavittu, Balaththa Kaiyaik Kandu Avargalaith Than Dhesaththilirundhu Thuraththi Viduvaan Endraar.
2 melum, Dhevan Moseyai Nokki: Naan Yegovaa,
3 sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan Ennum Naamaththinaal Naan Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Dharisanamaanen; Aanaalum Yegovaa Ennum En Naamaththinaal Naan Avargalukku Ariyappadavillai.
4 avargal Paradhesigalaaith Thangina Dhesamaagiya Kaanaan Dhesaththai Avargalukkuk Koduppen Endru Naan Avargalode En Udanbadikkaiyaiyum Erpaduththiyirukkiren.
5 ekipdhiyar Atimaikollukira Isravel Puththirarin Perumoochchaiyum Naan Kettu, En Utanpatikkaiyai Ninaiththen.

6 aadhalaal, Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Naane Karththar; Ungal Mel Egipthiyar Sumaththina Sumaigalai Neekki Naan Ungalai Viduviththu, Ungalai Avargal Adimaiththanaththirku Neengalaakki, Ongiya Kaiyinaalum, Magaa Thandanaigalinaalum Ungalai Meettu,
7 ungalai Enakku Janangalaagach Serththukkondu, Ungalukku Dhevanaayiruppen; Ungal Mel Egipthiyar Sumaththina Sumaigalai Neekki Ungalai Viduvikkira Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naan Endru Ariveergal.
8 aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Koduppen Endru Naan Aanaiyitta Dhesaththil Ungalaik Kondupoi, Adhai Ungalukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduppen; Naan Karththar Endru Avargalukkuch Sol Endraar.
9 indhap Piragaaramaaga Mose Isravel Puththirarukkuch Sonnaan; Avargalo Manamadivinaalum Kodumaiyaana Velaiyinaalum Mosekkuch Sevikodaamal Ponaargal.
10 pinbu, Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
11 nee Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonidaththil Poi, Avan Than Dhesaththilirundhu Isravel Puththiraraip Pogavidumbadi Avanode Pesu Endraar.
12 mose Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Nindru, Isravel Puththirare Enakkuch Sevikodukkavillai; Paarvon Enakku Eppadich Sevikoduppaan? Naan Viruththasedhanamillaadha Udhadugal Ullavan Endraan.

13 karththar Moseyodum Aaronodum Pesi, Isravel Puththirarai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththukkondu Pogumbadikku, Avargalai Isravel Puththiraridaththukkum Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonidaththukkum Kattalai Koduththu Anuppinaar.
14 avargaludaiya Pidhaakkal Veettaarin Thalaivar Yaarendraal, Isravelukku Mudhal Pirandhavanaagiya Roobanudaiya Kumaarar Aanokku, Palloo, Esron, Karmee; Ivargal Roobanudaiya Vamsangalin Thalaivar.
15 simiyonin Kumaarar Emuvel, Yaamin, Okaadh, Yaakeen, Sokaar, Kaanaaniya Sthireeyin Kumaaranaagiya Savul; Simiyonudaiya Vamsangalin Thalaivar Ivargale.
16 urpaththik Kiramappadi Pirandha Leviyin Kumaararudaiya Naamangalaavana, Kerson, Kokaadh, Meraari Enbavaigal. Levi Nootru Muppaththezhu Varusham Uyirodirundhaan.
17  Avaravar Vamsangalinbadi Pirandha Kersonin Kumaarar Lipnee, Simeyee Enbavargal.
18 kokaaththin Kumaarar Amraam, Idhseyaar, Epron, Oosiyel Enbavargal; Kokaadh Nootru Muppaththu Moondru Varusham Uyirodirundhaan.
19 meraariyin Kumaarar Makeli, Moosi Enbavargal; Avaravar Sandhadhiyinbadi Leviyinudaiya Vamsangalin Thalaivar Ivargale.
20 amraam Than Aththaiyaakiya Yokebeththai Vivaagam Panninaan; Aval Avanukku Aaronaiyum Moseyaiyum Petraal; Amraam Nootru Muppaththezhu Varusham Uyirodirundhaan.
21 idhseyaarin Kumaarar Koraaku, Neppek, Sidhri Enbavargal.
22 oosiyelin Kumaarar Meesavel, Elsaapaan, Sidhri Enbavargal.
23 aaron Amminadhaapin Kumaaraththiyum Nakasonin Sagodhariyumaagiya Elisabaalai Vivaagam Panninaan; Ival Avanukku Naadhaabaiyum, Abiyoovaiyum, Eleyaasaaraiyum, Iththaamaaraiyum Petraal.
24 koraakin Kumaarar Aaseer, Elkkaanaa, Apiyaasaap Enbavargal; Koraakiyarin Vamsaththalaivar Ivargale.

25 aaronin Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaar Pooththiyeludaiya Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyai Vivaagampanninaan, Aval Avanukkup Pinegaasaip Petraal; Avaravar Vamsangalinbadi Leviyarudaiya Pidhaakkalaagiya Thalaivar Ivargale.
26 isravel Puththirarai Aniyaniyaai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Nadaththikkondu Povadharkuk Karththaraal Kattalaipetra Aaronum Moseyum Ivargale.
27 isravel Puththirarai Egipthilirundhu Nadaththikkondu Povadharku, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvonode Pesina Moseyum Aaronum Ivargale.
28 karththar Egipthu Dhesaththile Moseyode Pesina Naalil;
29 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Naane Karththar; Naan Unnode Sollugiravaigalaiyellaam Nee Egipthu Raajaavaagiya Paarvonukkuch Sol Endru Sonnapodhu,
30 mose Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil: Naan Viruththasedhanamillaadha Udhadugalullavan; Paarvon Enakku Eppadich Sevikoduppaan Endraan.
